11#ifndef VPX_VPX_PORTS_MEM_H_
12#define VPX_VPX_PORTS_MEM_H_
13
14#include "vpx_config.h"
15#include "vpx/vpx_integer.h"
16
17#if (defined(__GNUC__) && __GNUC__) || defined(__SUNPRO_C)
18#define DECLARE_ALIGNED(n, typ, val) typ val __attribute__((aligned(n)))
19#elif defined(_MSC_VER)
20#define DECLARE_ALIGNED(n, typ, val) __declspec(align(n)) typ val
21#else
22#warning No alignment directives known for this compiler.
23#define DECLARE_ALIGNED(n, typ, val) typ val
24#endif
25
26#if HAVE_NEON && defined(_MSC_VER)
27#define __builtin_prefetch(x)
28#endif
29
30/* Shift down with rounding */
31#define ROUND_POWER_OF_TWO(value, n) (((value) + (1 << ((n)-1))) >> (n))
32#define ROUND64_POWER_OF_TWO(value, n) (((value) + (1ULL << ((n)-1))) >> (n))
33
34#define ALIGN_POWER_OF_TWO(value, n) \
35 (((value) + ((1 << (n)) - 1)) & ~((1 << (n)) - 1))
36
37#define CONVERT_TO_SHORTPTR(x) ((uint16_t *)(((uintptr_t)(x)) << 1))
38#define CAST_TO_SHORTPTR(x) ((uint16_t *)((uintptr_t)(x)))
39#if CONFIG_VP9_HIGHBITDEPTH
40#define CONVERT_TO_BYTEPTR(x) ((uint8_t *)(((uintptr_t)(x)) >> 1))
41#define CAST_TO_BYTEPTR(x) ((uint8_t *)((uintptr_t)(x)))
42#endif // CONFIG_VP9_HIGHBITDEPTH
43
44#endif // VPX_VPX_PORTS_MEM_H_
45
